abstract: Halloween is nigh, and the big question for those who dare to dress up is should one go pretty or ghoulish?
snippet: Halloween is nigh, and the big question for those who dare to dress up is should one go pretty or ghoulish?
lead_paragraph: Halloween is nigh, and the big question for those who dare to dress up is should one go pretty or ghoulish? This year, Lydia Hearst is going to be a scary zombie, the D.J. Chelsea Leyland is going as a "hot and sexy" black swan and Katrina Bowden ("30 Rock") will be a pretty Tinker Bell. Stylists are expecting requests for ever-glamorous Veronica Lake Hollywood curls, period finger waves and messy Amy Winehouse beehives.
